User report: Cannot close trade position - button greyed out on mobile app after market opened with a gap
User report: Deposit not reflected in account balance after 2 hours, bank confirmed debit
User report: Getting 502 Bad Gateway errors when trying to access trading dashboard since 9am
User report: Binary options contract expired but P&L not updated, still showing open position
User report: Two-factor authentication code not arriving via SMS, locked out of account

analysis.summary: Widespread platform outage impacting core trading functionalities (order execution, trade closing, market data), user authentication, payment processing, and API accessibility, indicated by high latency, 502 errors, and critical service connection failures.
analysis.root_cause: A critical infrastructure failure, likely involving network instability or resource exhaustion impacting shared services such as Redis (causing authentication and caching issues) and connectivity to the matching engine and payment processors, exacerbated by a failing backend server node.
analysis.next_steps: 1. Immediately investigate and resolve core infrastructure issues (network, Redis cluster health, backend server stability). 2. Restore connectivity to the matching engine and payment processor. 3. Address authentication failures and unblock user access. 4. Communicate status updates to users.
